comment: Amanda Wansa-Morgan is the example of what an educator can and SHOULD be. She is immensely knowledgeable and an active contributor to the field. Show up, be prepared and ready to give it your all and she will give you her all right back. Best prof. Ive ever had. Hands down. I can not stress enough: listen when she speaks, youll learn every time.

Amanda is a true gem to have. She is very flexible with grading. In class, with showings, she gives you useful critiques. Also, projects in class will help you later in life. MT Tech is definitely a class I recommend, and Amanda is AMAZING!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.
